author: foxnews.com
title: “Preaching Against The Choir”: What We All Can Learn From Alan Colmes … | Tom Sullivan Radio Show
text: To many, it seems like Alan Colmes spent a lot of his legendary broadcasting career battling. Whether it was on syndicated radio show or his time spent on FOX News, Alan, the proud liberal, was regularly debating conservatives. Many times, arguing "unpopular" views in places where he was outnumb
